snippet.title: "Totally Spies!" - Gameloft 2005 (Java Game)
snippet.description:
"Totally Spies! " "Totally Spies!  java" "Totally Spies!  (J2ME)" "Java Game" "Phone Game" "Java Mobile" 
Beverly Hills teenage superspies Sam, Clover, and Alex are whisked away from their classroom by their boss Joey, leader of the secret World Organization of Human Protection (WOOHP). The Scarab of Salitis has been stolen from an Egyptian pyramid and the girls have to retrieve it. That first mission will then take them to Himalayan Mountains and finally a space station - 8 levels in total.

Based on the French animation series of the same name, the player controls one of the 3 girls through side-scrolling platforms environments. Based on the phones' screen sizes, there are 3 versions and they differ in moves, the amount of levels and certain features. Gameplay consists of avoiding obstacles, timing jumps to platforms and fighting enemies. Enemies can be taken out from behind, using objects in the environment, or by a series of fighting combos. Using gadgets provided by their boss Joey, they can swing over holes, pull levers from a distance, or use a jet pack. Two levels have the player only fly a jet pack, while being chased and avoiding obstacles.

During the levels, the story is further explained through small in-game cutscenes. The beginning of the game also serves as the tutorial, where the various possibilities are gradually explained.

Sam, Alex, and Clover are just three normal high school girls from Beverly Hills...well, almost! Besides the usual teen concerns – fashion, hair, and boys – they’ve got to deal with their spy activities for WOOHP, a top secret crime-fighting organization led by Jerry. At any moment, they can be “woohped” by Jerry and sent off on missions to the four corners of the world in pursuit of power-hungry megalomaniacs or dangerous individuals who want to blow up the planet. 
================================================================================
Сэм, Алекс и Клоувер - три обычные девчонки. Они ходят в школу и увлекаются тем, чему отдают предпочтение большинство их сверстниц: модой, прическами, мальчиками. Но у подруг есть еще одно незаурядное хобби - они работают в качестве шпионов в сверхсекретном агентстве по борьбе с преступностью «WOOHP». В любой момент их босс Джерри может вызвать девчонок на выполнение очередной сложной миссии в любую точку земного шара. Вас ждут опасные и захватывающие приключения в песках Египта, в снегах Гималаев и даже в космосе! В Вашем распоряжении множество полезных шпионских приспособлений, в том числе ракетный ранец и лазерная пушка, замаскированная под губную помаду.
================================================================================
#WarofTheWorlds #Gameloft #javagame #джаваигры #игра #игранателефон #мобильнаяигра #phonegame #mobilegame  #oldgames
